forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 3 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As night descends over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a crispness that hints at the tranquility of the approaching evening. The skies are mostly clear, revealing a beautiful canopy of stars where the brilliance of the day's sun has retreated. The low temperature is expected to settle around a cool 52 degrees, accompanied by a gentle west wind that picks up at times, creating subtle, playful gusts. In the distance, the well-known silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge stands firm, its majesty timeless against the backdrop of a darkening sky.

Looking forward to Tuesday, expect a brilliant sun to grace the city, promising a high near 66 that will taper down pleasantly during the afternoon. The breeze will be gentle, allowing for leisurely strolls down the waterfront or perhaps a casual coffee at one of the charming cafés. As the day unfolds, dressing in layers will be wise—think a light sweater over a favorite shirt, which allows you to adapt to the shifting warmth and coolness of the day. Whether wandering through the vibrant streets or simply soaking in the atmospheric beauty from a cozy spot, it’s a perfect opportunity to savor a moment in the heart of the city.
